reqs:
Co-reqs: (STAT 251 or equivalent course in elementary statistics, CIVL 403 or equivalent course in Engineering Eceonomics.)
Equivalents:
courseName: Urban Systems Project Delivery and Economics
description: Stakeholder practices: stakeholder engagement, public consultation, partnerships, stakeholder management, buy-in. Project delivery: project delivery options, public-private partnerships (P3), integrated project delivery (IPD), partnering. Modeling, analytical methods, and decision support: economic and risk modeling.
